text: And he went into the inner sanctuary and measured the side pillars at the entrance to be two cubits wide.41:3 2 (long) cubits is approximately 3.5 feet or 1.1 meters. The entrance was six cubits wide, and the walls on each side were seven cubits wide.41:3 7 (long) cubits is approximately 12.25 feet or 3.7 meters.
